glitter.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to shine brightly with flashing points of light
glitter.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The river glittered in the sunlight.
glitter.translation[0].definitions[1].de: if someone’s eyes glitter, they shine very brightly and show a particular strong emotion
glitter.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: His blue eyes glittered with anger.
glitter.translation[1].definitions[0].de: brightness consisting of many flashing points of light
glitter.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: the glitter of his gold cigarette case
glitter.translation[1].definitions[1].de: a bright shining expression in someone’s eyes that shows a particular emotion
glitter.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: There was no mistaking the mocking glitter in his eyes.
glitter.translation[1].definitions[2].de: the exciting attractive quality of a place or a way of life which is connected with rich or famous people
glitter.translation[1].definitions[2].ex: The glamour and glitter of London was not for him.
glitter.translation[1].definitions[3].de: very small pieces of shiny paper that are used for decoration
